value.name: Huntington Beach suspect killed in officer-involved shooting
value.description: According to police, there was a confrontation, and the officer fatally shot the unidentified male suspect. He was identified by a family member as 26-year-old Eric Marquez. The officer was not hurt.

value.name: Two Men Suspected Of Murdering UCLA Student In Custody
value.description: Alberto Medina and Eric Marquez were arrested in connection with the murder of Andrea DelVesco, 21, of Austin, Texas, over the weekend. CBS2's Kara Finnstrom reports.
